duties_responsibilities.duty: Performing a wide range of sample preparation tasks including labeling, transferring, liquid nitrogen use, milling, blending, weighing, and disposal of samples.
Communicating sample information and any discrepancies to the appropriate personnel.
Handling internal customer inquiries and requests.
Understanding the process for handling hazardous wastes and receiving on-the-job training for handling specific waste types.
Ability to work overtime and weekend work as required.
